channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vanilla Ice is flipping a Texas home for just $409,000
item.description: Vanilla Ice has spent the past two decades flipping homes and building a real estate empire across the country.

item.title: I’m 58, divorced and will retire at 60 with $5,300 a month. Is now a good time to buy a house?
item.description: “Due to my two divorces, I had to leave the homes I bought and give up all the equity.”

item.title: McDonald’s is bringing back its popular Monopoly game — and analysts say it could lift sales
item.description: The promotion was a mainstay for the Golden Arches chain in a previous era.

item.title: Singer The Weeknd is buying this huge $55 million Florida mansion, complete with a superyacht dock
item.description: Pop sensation The Weeknd is reportedly in contract to buy an extraordinarily lavish $54.9 million waterfront mansion in Florida.

item.title: Investors have grounds to fear Japan’s Iron Lady, caution Wall Street brokers
item.description: The surprise party victory for Sanae Takaichi has brokers fearful about Japan’s currency and bonds.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these 3 dividend stocks for stable returns
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service discusses three dividend-paying stocks, including Brookfield Infrastructure Partners and Ares Capital.

item.title: Chip stocks have had quite a run this year. Technicals say be careful from here
item.description: Semiconductor stocks have been on a tear and rank among the best performers this year.
